Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of longterm debt excluding assetbacked debt
proceeds from issuance of secured debt
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term borrowings and finance lease obligations
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
acquisitions net of cash acquired and investments
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire other productive assets
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
portion of aggregate value received in connection with merger as special cash payments
proceeds from sale of intangible assets

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: equity in earnings of unconsolidated businesses net of dividends received
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of business
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
other operating activities cash flow statement
Stock-Based Compensation: employee benefits and share based compensation noncash
